metadata.description: The artworks of the progenitor of deconstructionism in italy, Giovanbattista Pastorelli, continue in a modern key. Fragments of Gio Pastorelli is an nft collection of fragments of some of his most famous artworks. Pierre Restany said of him 'Pastorelli is a great nomad in time travel. Time for him is not history, it is legend. And the legend of his time is made up of fragmented and fragmented references.' Buy the pieces to create your favourite artwork. 3 fragments will be sufficient to have the right to the artwork in its entirety.
metadata.name: David Bowie 5/9
